title: Best chocolate cake with fudge frosting
ingredients: ['110g butter', '110g margarine', '250ml water', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '250g plain flour', '400g caster sugar', '120ml milk', '1 tablespoon distilled vinegar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Fudge frosting', '6 tablespoons butter', '4 tablespoons milk', '3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '375g sifted icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
